string.value: Meeting the Dragon Rider

string.name: parent
string.value: Dragon Mount
Follow #p1032001#'s suggestion and go find the person named #bFangBlade#k in #b#m102000000##k. He is supposed to be very powerful so maybe he is in the Warrior's Sanctuary.

You meet #p9901000#. He is very friendly, promising to tell you about mounting a Dragon but says you need a saddle first. He mentions that people who came from #b#m130000000##k have very cool saddles. You should go to #m130000000# and bring back a saddle.\r\n\r\n#i1912033# #t1912033# #b#c1912033# / 1#k
After you went to the Aquarium and brought back a saddle, #p9901000# taught you the Monster Rider skill.

Hello. My name is #p9901000#. Would you like advice on how to be a powerful Warrior? Hm, you're not a Warrior... What can I do for you?\r\n#L0##bI heard that you know how to mount a Dragon... Is that true?#l\n#k

Yes, it's true. I am able to mount a Dragon thanks to the blessing of the Goddess, though I was quite surprised when I discovered that fact. But why do you ask?\r\n#L0##bWell, I would also like to mount a Dragon and want to know how! Can you teach me?#l\n#k

Well, to get a Dragon from the Goddess, you need to reach Lv. 200 with an Adventurer character. As you may know, that is no easy task. It actually took me several years.\r\n#L0##bOh, you don't have to worry about that! I already have a Dragon!#l\n#k

That thing standing next to you? It looks so different from my Dragon that I thought it was just a really big lizard! I don't think you are Lv. 200. How did you get it?\r\n#L0##bI found it. Hehe.#l\n#k

You found it? There must be a story behind this... In any case, I will tell you about mounting Dragons. But just having a Dragon doesn't mean you can mount it. You'll need to prepare some items.\r\n#L0##bSure. Like what?#l\n#k
The first thing you'll need is a very #bstrong saddle#k. Without one, the hard scales will destroy your bottom...\r\n#L0##bWhere can I get a strong saddle?#l\n#k
I'm not sure. I actually had my saddle naturally upgraded through the Goddess's blessing.\r\n#L0##bI see. Well, do you have any guesses?#l\n#k
Hmm... Those #bpeople who ride birds#k seem to have nice-looking saddles... Maybe you can get a strong saddle from wherever they get theirs. At the very least, you'd get more info...
I believe those people who ride birds come from #b#m130000000##k. Maybe you should over there.
I'm sorry I couldn't be of more help. But if you are able to get a strong saddle, I will go ahead and teach you the Monster Rider skill.
Hmm... You haven't seen the people who ride around on birds? Perhaps someone in their homeland makes their sandles for them...
Oh, you got a saddle! It looks strong enough to protect you from the Dragon's scales. I will now teach you the Monster Rider skill.
I've taught you the Monster Rider skill. With this skill and a saddle, you should be able to mount your Dragon freely.
Just remember that you have to get off your Dragon when you use skills. Otherwise, your Dragon may get hurt. Also remember that you will not be able to mount in certain areas.
I hope you have great adventures mounted on your Dragon.

Have you still not been able to find a strong saddle to protect your bottom from the Dragon's scales? The people who ride around on birds seem to all have really nice saddles... Why don't you try going to their homeland? I heard that they are from #b#m130000000##k.
